parameters.name: DBInstanceId
parameters.description:
The instance ID.

>  You can call the [DescribeDBInstances](~~86911~~) operation to query the information about all AnalyticDB for PostgreSQL instances within a region, including instance IDs.

parameters.name: EndTime
parameters.description: The end of the time range to query. Specify the time in the yyyy-MM-ddTHH:mm:ssZ format. The end time must be later than the start time.

parameters.name: Keyword
parameters.description: The keyword used to filter queries.

parameters.name: MaxDuration
parameters.description: The maxmum amount of time consumed by traces. Unit: milliseconds.

parameters.name: MinDuration
parameters.description: The minimum amount of time consumed by traces. Unit: milliseconds.

parameters.name: Order
parameters.description:
The field used to sort lock diagnostics records and the sorting order.

Default value: `{"Field":"StartTime","Type":"Desc"}`, which indicates that lock diagnostics records are sorted by the start time in descending order. No other values are supported.

parameters.name: StartTime
parameters.description: The beginning of the time range to query. Specify the time in the yyyy-MM-ddTHH:mmZ format. The time must be in UTC.

parameters.name: User
parameters.description: The name of the database account.
